data.title: Obituaries - Seawright Funeral Homes
data.meta_description: Seawright Funeral Home and Crematory has been providing funeral services for over 90 years.Look up your loved ones' obituaries online & leave a lasting tribute.
data.text:
Lynn Suddeth Dobbins

Mar 17, 1954 - Jul 15, 2024

Lynn Suddeth Dobbins of Inman, SC went to her heavenly home to sing with the angels on July 15, 2024. She was the daughter of Rachel Suddeth and the late George Edward Suddeth. The loving wife of Danny Ray Dobbins and proud mother of Patrick Dobbins (Hayley) and Andrew Dobbins. Nana leaves a precious grandson,…

Ann Melton

Jan 17, 1951 - Jul 15, 2024

Cecelia Ann Melton, 73, of Inman, SC, passed away Monday, July 15, 2024 at her home. Ann was born in Fingerville, SC on January 17, 1951. She was a daughter of the late Robert Cecil Price and the late Daphne Horton Martin. She was the wife of A. J. Melton. Her survivors include a son,…

Gurmit Singh Sandhu

Jan 15, 1964 - Jul 14, 2024

Gurmit Singh Sandhu, 60, of 236 Prominence Ridge Drive in Chesnee, passed away Sunday, July 14th, 2024, at Mary Black Memorial Hospital. Gurmit was born in Punjab, India on January 15, 1964, a son of Mata Ranjit Kaur and S. Darshan Singh. Gurmit is survived by his wife, three sons and their wives, a daughter and her…

Doris C. Pruitt

Oct 22, 1932 - Jul 11, 2024

Mrs. Doris Caldwell Pruitt, 91, of 461 Rock Hill Church Road, Inman, SC, passed away Thursday, July 11, 2024 at White Oak at North Grove in Spartanburg, SC. A native of Spartanburg County, she was the daughter of the late Kate (Denton) Caldwell and Aubrey Lamar Caldwell.She was a devoted member of Inman Presbyterian Church,…

Margaret Carolyn Johnson

Jul 30, 1938 - Jul 9, 2024

Margaret Carolyn Johnson, 85, of 145 Brookview Drive, Inman, passed away Tuesday, July 9th, at Spartanburg Medical Center with her family by her side. She was a loving wife, mother, grandmother, and devoted servant of the Lord.Carolyn was born in Spartanburg on July 30, 1938, a daughter of the late Elizabeth Fisher Jackson and was…

Albert Alexander Jolley

Apr 21, 1939 - Jul 9, 2024

Albert Alexander Jolley, 85, of 1147 Martin Road Spartanburg, passed away Tuesday, July 9, 2024 at Spartanburg Regional Hospice Home. Albert was born in Spartanburg, South Carolina on April 21, 1939, a son of the late Ida Mae Mitchem Jolley and Bennie Jolley and was the husband of Lois Colley Jolley of the home.He retired from Sunbelt…

Michelle Rae Taylor

Oct 25, 1964 - Jul 8, 2024

Michelle Rae Taylor, 59, of Inman, South Carolina went home to be with the Lord on Monday, July 8, 2024 after a courageous two and half year battle with cancer. Born in Sterling Heights, Michigan on October 25, 1964, she was the daughter of the late Ira Gordon Taylor and Janet Bridwell Taylor. Michelle was a graduate…

Sharon Harrelson Kissam

Feb 1, 1969 - Jul 7, 2024

Sharon Harrelson Kissam, 55, went home peacefully to be with her Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ on July 7, 2024. She was born February 1, 1969. Sharon was preceded in death by her loving Husband, Greg Kissam, Maternal Grandmother Ruby Farmer and Maternal Grandfather Walter Farmer, Paternal Grandmother Bernice Bowen Harrelson and Paternal Grandfather Ralph…

Rev. Everette Henry Chapman

Aug 19, 1940 - Jul 4, 2024

Everette Henry Chapman born August 19, 1940, passed away July 4, 2024, at Prism Health ICU Trauma Center, Greenville, SC. Mr. Chapman was one of nine children born to the late Jamie Wyatt Chapman and Rev. Clarence E. Chapman. He was the husband of Virginia (Jenny) Greene formally of Boone, NC. They were a blended…

Roger Wyman Cantrell

Sep 5, 1944 - Jul 2, 2024

Roger W. CantrellInman Roger Wyman Cantrell, 79, of 1390 Rock Hill Church Rd Inman, passed away Tuesday, July 2, 2024, at his home. Roger was born in Polk County, NC on September 5, 1944, a son of the late Eunice and Wallace Cantrell and was the husband of Barbara Harmon Cantrell.He retired from Sunbeam Bakery, now Sara…
